Seem to be just what is required here =

a pull request, there's probably some co=
mplication I don't understand
here ? Given that junit builds with ant (well=
 mostly...) and the problem
is easily solved with ant, why not just use ant=
 ? Whoever makes the
release just runs a few extra ant steps, closes the st=
aging repo on
oss.sonatype.org and voila ?




Kristian
